pkgmetadata.longdescription: Toolkit implementation of the gWidgets API for use with web pages // Port of the gWidgets API to program dynamic websites. Can be used with R's dynamic help web server to serve local files. This provides a convenient means to make local GUIs for users without concern for external GUI toolkits. Also, in combination with RApache, http://biostat.mc.vanderbilt.edu/rapache/index.html, this framework can be used to make public websites powered by R. The Ext JavaScript libararies (www.extjs.com) are used to create and manipulate the widgets dynamically.
